data.text:
2024 is approaching steadily ü•∞

How old will you be in 2024?üéÇ

In this article,Japan and Korean idols who are 20 years old in 2024I will introduce at once‚ô™

Recently, the number of Fundams to prepare Senil advertisements and hold Caphani events on the recommended birthday ^^

For the 20th birthday to be commemoratedI want to give Senil advertising!„Äç„ÄåI want to give a cheering advertisement!If you think, please feel free to contact us.

„ÄåI'm interested in advertising, but I don't know how to put it out ...„Äç„ÄåI'm worried about the cost ..."Some people will surely come.üòä

This time, we will also introduce the service called "Senil Crafan" for such people.‚ô™

What is Senil Crafan?Service that plans a project that issues support advertisements by individuals, share support money with supporters, and realize recommended advertising"!

If you are interested or are lost, we also provide free consultation on LINE, so please register your friend first.‚ô™

Thorough explanation of the "adult" situation in Japan and Korea!

Quote source

Until a while ago"20 years old = adult"It was a positionüí°

However, last year, the adult age was reduced in Japan, which became a big news!

Such "reduction of adult age" has actually been done in Korea.üò≥

From now on, we will introduce the difference between the current "adult" in Japan and Korea.üåü

What is the "adult age" of each of Japan and Korea?

The current adult age in Japan is18-year-oldisüí°

Previously, the adult age, 20 years old, turned 18 from April 2022.

On the other hand, the adult age in Korea is19 years oldis!

In Korea, like Japan, it was previously 20 years old = adult.

However, the law has been reviewed, and the adult age has been reduced to 19 years old since July 2013 ^^

Is there a coming -of -age ceremony in Korea? What is the difference in how to celebrate Japan and Korea?

In Japan, the ‚Äúcoming -of -age ceremony‚Äù is one of the big events of life!

The coming -of -age ceremony is held every year near the second Monday of January near the public holiday "Adult Day", except for some areas.üëë

There is also a day like "Adult Day" in Korea.‚ú®

That is "Adult Day (ÏÑ±ÎÖÑ Ïùò ÎÇ†)", which is specified on the third Monday of May every year ^^

However, South Korea's "Adult Day" is different from Japan, not a national holiday.

In addition, large events such as the coming -of -age ceremony are basically held, and we celebrate with close friends, such as family, friends, and lovers.üòä

Introducing idols in Japan and Korea, who are 20 years old in 2024!

Adults have passed, but it can be said to be one of the milestones of life20-year-oldAge ü•∞

from here,"Japan -Korea Idol born in 2004", which is 20 years old in 2024I will introduce all together ^^‚ô™

A must -see for those who are 20 years old! Let's celebrate Senlilled with Senil Crafan!

Birthday of pushing 20 years oldüéÇ‚ú®

Would you like to celebrate luxuriously? Lingeringüíì

BirthdayIn Japan, "Senil CrafanIs providing a serviceüåü

What is Senil Crafan?A service that launches a project to launch a support advertisement for individuals, and the people who agree with the plan to share support money and realize the recommended advertising."!

We will launch a project using crowdfunding, and realize an advertisement (Senil/support advertising) with support from supporters.‚ô™

Recently, TOZ YUTO, Tomorrow X Together SOOBIN, & Team's Senil Crafan achieved the target amount and advertised ^^

We will support all procedures, from the launch of the project to the creation of advertising design, the management of support, and the delivery of returns.‚ù£

Please leave it with confidence even for the first time.üôå

„ÄåI want to know more about Senil Crafan!If you say, by all meansHerePlease also see!

Introducing the types of advertisements that can be issued with Senil Crafan and a series of flow from achieving it.‚ô™

We also provide free consultation on LINE, so please feel free to contact us.‚ú®

summary

This time, we introduced the idols of Japan and South Korea, who turned 20 in 2024!

How do you spend your 20th birthday, one of the milestones of life?

Leave messages on SNS, prepare cakes and balloons, go to see Senil ads ... There are many ways to enjoy (*¬®*)‚ô°

Please enjoy the anniversary of the important push.üéÇüíì

BirthdayLeave it to Japan!

After reading this article, many people may have felt, "I want to release Senil!"‚ô™

„ÄåI don't have the courage to advertise ...„Äç„ÄåIsn't the procedure difficult?If you are worried, please feel free to consult Senil JAPAN ^^

BirthdayIf you register the official LINE of JAPAN,Automatic response chat solves concerns about cheering advertising!

It is safe to be able to consult by phone as well as chat to the staff.‚ô™

Consultation -medium arrangement -design production -advertising reportYou can complete it only with LINE!

First of all, please register LINE friends ^^

‚òÖBirthdayJAPAN SNS information‚òÖ

BirthdayIn Japan, "Twitter„Äç„ÄåInstagram„Äç„ÄåTiktokWe are also distributing SNS‚ô™

We distribute not only the information of Senil/support advertisements, but also the information of actors and idols, and great deals, so please follow up ^^

Twitter (@birthday_ad_jp)

„ÄåBirthdayI want to get JAPAN information as soon as possible!If you say, please follow Twitter‚ô™

On Twitter, we will deliver information on blogs such as idols and actors that we have updated every week we have updated every week ^^

We also deliver information on campaigns, so don't miss it!

Instagram (@Birthday.ad.jp)

„ÄåI want to get information in an easy -to -understand manner!If you say, please follow Instagram!

Instagram offers the contents of the actors and idol blogs that we distribute every week in images in an easy -to -understand manner.‚ô™

We also introduce the Senil/Support Advertisements held, so if you are considering it, please refer to it!

You can always look back by "saving" your favorite posts ^^

Tiktok (@Birthday.ad.jp)

„ÄåEmphasis on time shorter! I want to get information quickly in the video!For those who say, we recommend following Tiktok.‚ô™

@birthday.ad.jp This is our thoughts on our activitiesüòÑI'm looking forward to being connected with everyone with the same feelings!#Promotion #KPOP #Tota activity #Senil advertising #Senil advertising Agency JAPAN #South Korea #Japan #Korean information ‚ô¨ Pop! --Nayeon

Tiktok explains information about Senil/support advertisements and blog information in an easy -to -understand manner ^^

Because it is a short video, you can watch it in a short time in the morning.‚ô™

We plan to send various information through SNS in the future!

Please follow up so that you do not miss the latest information ^^
